execution_quality: Excellent execution with proper git workflow. Agent ran status/diff checks first, analyzed changes, drafted appropriate commit message, and successfully created the commit with co-authored attribution.
work_category: Git workflow task - user requested committing staged changes to the repository. Agent performed pre-commit checks and created a commit with proper formatting.
summary: Agent successfully completed a straightforward git commit task by following proper workflow practices - checking status, reviewing changes, drafting a meaningful commit message, and executing the commit. The session ended cleanly with no follow-up, indicating the user's request was fully satisfied.
follow_up_pattern: Session ended immediately after commit completion with no follow-up message, indicating user was satisfied with the outcome and either left or moved to other work.
